blockquote.para: .. and this time even with a timely tar-ball, since I'm not traveling any more.
What do we have in it? More than in -rc2. I'm clearly not the only one who was in Japan for LinuxCon, or something else just made people wake up.

There's a lot of small one-liners, but a few bigger chunks too: Radeon DRI updates, some btrfs updates, and fixing Sparc LEON support (and supporting PCI). Smaller updates to nilfs2 and ceph, and s390 and arm. Other than that, it's mostly random driver updates all over.

I'm including the shortlog, which is fairly self-explanatory: small random changes, nothing hugely interesting. It will matter to people only if it happens to fix that one small nagging issue you had.
But as usual, I'll ask people to give it a good testing,
